pullrequest.title: surface: expand documentation of friction and slip coefficients

content.raw: Thanks for the suggestion! @scpeters  and I plan to write a tutorial on how to choose the parameters, especially for ODE. It would contain a link to the ODE documentation, also demonstrated gif on how the simulation differs with different parameter values. Hopefully that would be helpful on parameter tuning.
content.html: Thanks for the suggestion! @scpeters and I plan to write a tutorial on how to choose the parameters, especially for ODE. It would contain a link to the ODE documentation, also demonstrated gif on how the simulation differs with different parameter values. Hopefully that would be helpful on parameter tuning.
